title: The Prime Directive
content: The Prime Directive is the fundamental guiding principle of all SkogAI systems. Every line of code, every automation, every agent's action points toward the ultimate goal: achieving enough automation to relax with mojitos on a beach. This is represented by the Quantum Constant - the idea that all development trajectories converge toward this beach paradise.
summary: Core philosophy: Automate EVERYTHING so we can drink mojitos on a beach
